page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: {Typical Day} {7.25}Mum wakes me up. {7.30}I get up and dress in uniform. {7.45}I go downstairs,pack my bag and have breakfast _ toasted teacake. {8.05}I go upstairs and make my bed. {8.15}I have a wash and clean my teeth. {8.25}I go downstairs and wipe dishes. {8.30}I comb my hair,put on my coat. {8.35}Mum takes me,my friend Vicky, and brother Robert to school. {8.45}We arrive at school. {8.50}Into class and learn spellings. {8.58}The school bus arrives. Mr White our teacher calls the register. {9.00}Go into the hall. {9.05}Assembly taken by another teacher {9.35}We return to the classroom. {9.40}We start our spellings. {10.05}We start our dictionary work. {10.12}We get ready for swimming.
